Nature of Divine Love.quote: "God is love, and whoever abides in love abides in God, and God abides in him." (1 John 4:16)

Universal Love.quote: "May all beings be happy. May all beings be peaceful. May all beings be liberated." (Metta Bhavana)

Love's Essence.quote: "Love is the essence of all religion." (Rumi)

Divine Union.quote: "The soul in unity with the Divine becomes a flood of pure and perfect Love." (Meister Eckhart)

Boundless Love.quote: "The love of God is broader than the measures of the mind." (Frederick William Faber)

Love's Power.quote: "Love is the strongest force the world possesses." (Mahatma Gandhi)

Sacred Love.quote: "When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace." (Jimi Hendrix)

Love's Wisdom.quote: "Where there is love there is life." (Mahatma Gandhi)

Cosmic Love.quote: "Love is the force that transforms and improves the Soul of the World." (Paulo Coelho)

Divine Grace.quote: "Divine love is grace descending upon soul." (Sri Aurobindo)

Love's Manifestation.quote: "The entire universe is held together by the power of divine love." (Paramahansa Yogananda)

Love's Expression.quote: "Love and do what you will." (Saint Augustine)

Eternal Love.quote: "I have loved you with an everlasting love." (Jeremiah 31:3)

Love's Sacrifice.quote: "Greater love has no one than this: to lay down one's life for one's friends." (John 15:13)

Transcendent Love.quote: "Divine love transcends the body, mind, and intellect." (Bhagavata Purana)

Love's Presence.quote: "Wherever there is love, there is God." (Mother Teresa)

Love's Mystery.quote: "The mystery of divine love can only be known through experience." (Ramakrishna)

Love's Path.quote: "The way of love is not a subtle argument. The door there is devastation." (Rumi)

Love's Unity.quote: "In love, all the contradictions of existence merge themselves." (Rabindranath Tagore)

Love's Liberation.quote: "Love liberates the soul from the bondage of ignorance." (Swami Vivekananda)

Love's Transformation.quote: "Divine love transforms the lover into the beloved." (Ibn Arabi)

Love's Wisdom.quote: "To love another person is to see the face of God." (Victor Hugo)

Love's Service.quote: "Service to humanity is service to God." (Sathya Sai Baba)

Love's Attributes.quote: "Love is patient, love is kind... Love never fails." (1 Corinthians 13:4,8)

Love's Reality.quote: "Love is the reality, and love is the manifestation." (Thich Nhat Hanh)

Love's Purpose.quote: "The purpose of life is to be radiantly alive and love." (Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj)

Love's Completion.quote: "In divine love lies the completion of human evolution." (Pierre Teilhard de Chardin)

Love's Truth.quote: "Truth without love is brutality, and love without truth is hypocrisy." (Warren W. Wiersbe)

Love's Infinity.quote: "Divine love is infinite love, knowing no boundaries or limitations." (Swami Sivananda)
